Summary: Driving along I-69 westbound @ Hamerburg Rd.
divs: Sighting DetailsDriving along westbound,happen to look over to my left and saw a triangular craft hovering,had really bright lights,like headlights but pointing at the ground,and at the top it had a dome like structure,it had read and green lights like an airplane,but it was not a plane at all. Condition was partly cloudy but I could see it clearly. I would be interested if someone else see this craft other than me.
trends: There have been 40 other sightings in Flint
There were no other sightings in Flint on or around January 4th 2010
